alert.note: Alert for Cass (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 03 at 9:27AM CDT until further notice by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in North Dakota... Sheyenne River at Lisbon affecting Ransom County. Sheyenne River Diversion at West Fargo affecting Cass County. Sheyenne River at Harwood affecting Cass County. Sheyenne River near Kindred affecting Richland and Cass Counties. Maple River near Mapleton (South of I-94) affecting Cass County. Maple River near Enderlin affecting Ransom and Cass Counties. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is occurring and moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Sheyenne River at Harwood. * WHEN...Until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 91.0 feet, MAJOR FLOOD. BNSF railroad line may need to be closed. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:15 AM CDT Tuesday the stage was 89.6 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall to 89.1 feet Tuesday morning. - Flood stage is 84.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Safety message - Turn around, don`t drown. Don`t travel through flooded areas. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
